pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extended Generalised Linear Hidden Markov Models // Fits a variety of hidden Markov models, structured in an extended generalized linear model framework. See T. Rolf Turner, Murray A. Cameron, and Peter J. Thomson (1998) doi:10.2307/3315677, and Rolf Turner (2008) doi:10.1016/j.csda.2008.01.029 and the references cited therein.
